name: Chicken Crossing (haroldo-ok)
description:
A competitive four player game for the Sega Master System. Try to get your chicken
across the road before the other players do.

This game is distributed as a Sega Master System ROM; you will need an emulator in order to run that. It may or may not work on the real hardware.

Controls:

  • Player 1:  up and down on joypad 1;
  • Player 2: button 1 and button 2 on joypad 1;
  • Player 3: up and down on joypad 2;
  • Player 4: button 1 and button 2 on joypad 2.

This is a work in progress.

GitHub repo: https://github.com/haroldo-ok/chicken-crossing
